verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <WH5315> If a soul כִּ֣י <WH3588> When תֶחֱטָ֔א <WH2398> sin וּמָעֲלָ֥ה <WH4603> and commit מַ֖עַל <WH4604> a trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> against the LORD וְכִחֵ֨שׁ <WH3584> and lie בַּעֲמִית֜וֹ <WH5997> unto his neighbour בְּפִקָּד֗וֹן <WH6487> in that which was delivered אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or בִתְשׂ֤וּמֶת <WH8667> A security יָד֙ <WH3027> entrusted א֣וֹ <WH176> or בְגָזֵ֔ל <WH1498> or in a thing taken away by violence א֖וֹ <WH176> or עָשַׁ֥ק <WH6231> or hath deceived אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH5997> his neighbour

אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or מָצָ֧א <WH4672> Or have found אֲבֵדָ֛ה <WH9> that which was lost וְכִ֥חֶשׁ <WH3584> and lieth בָּ֖הּ וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ע <WH7650> concerning it and sweareth עַל־ <WH5921> regard שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> falsely עַל־ <WH5921> regard אַחַ֗ת <WH259> in any מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> one אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> doeth הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> of all these that a man לַחֲטֹ֥א <WH2398> sinning בָהֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> therein

וְהָיָה֮ <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> shall be when יֶחֱטָ֣א <WH2398> Then it shall be because he hath sinned וְאָשֵׁם֒ <WH816> and is guilty וְהֵשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> that he shall restore אֶת־ <WH853> הַגְּזֵלָ֜ה <WH1497> which he took violently away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what גָּזָ֗ל <WH1497> robbery א֤וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <WH6233> or the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what עָשָׁ֔ק <WH6231> which he hath deceitfully gotten א֚וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> הַפִּקָּד֔וֹן <WH6487> the deposit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הָפְקַ֖ד <WH6487> the deposit אִתּ֑וֹ <WH853> א֥וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲבֵדָ֖ה <WH9> or the lost thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מָצָֽא׃ <WH4672> which he found

א֠וֹ <WH176> or מִכֹּ֞ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִשָּׁבַ֣ע <WH7650> Or all that about which he hath sworn עָלָיו֮ <WH5921> and לַשֶּׁקֶר֒ <WH8267> falsely וְשִׁלַּ֤ם <WH7999> he shall even restore אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> it in the principal וַחֲמִשִׁתָ֖יו <WH2549> the fifth part יֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> more עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> to the one לַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> to whom ה֥וּא <WH1931> he ל֛וֹ יִתְּנֶ֖נּוּ <WH5414> thereto [and] give בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> it unto him to whom it appertaineth in the day אַשְׁמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH819> of his trespass offering

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲשָׁמ֥וֹ <WH817> his trespass offering יָבִ֖יא <WH935> And he shall bring לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אַ֣יִל <WH352> a ram תָּמִ֧ים <WH8549> without blemish מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצֹּ֛אן <WH6629> out of the flock בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <WH6187> with thy estimation לְאָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> for a trespass offering אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> unto the priest

וְכִפֶּ֨ר <WH3722> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <WH5921> and הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> for him before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְנִסְלַ֣ח <WH5545> and it shall be forgiven ל֑וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> for אַחַ֛ת <WH259> him for any thing מִכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> of the things אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> of all that he hath done לְאַשְׁמָ֥ה <WH819> in trespassing בָֽהּ׃ פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַ֤ו <WH6680> Command אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> and his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> This [is] the law הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering הִ֣וא <WH1931> itself הָעֹלָ֡ה <WH5930> It [is] the burnt offering עַל֩ <WH5921> on מוֹקְדָ֨ה <WH4169> because of the burning עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <WH4196> upon the altar כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> all night עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> unto the morning וְאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> and the fire הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> of the altar תּ֥וּקַד <WH3344> shall be burning בּֽוֹ׃

וְלָבַ֨שׁ <WH3847> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> And the priest מִדּ֣וֹ <WH4055> garment בַ֗ד <WH906> on his linen וּמִֽכְנְסֵי־ <WH4370> breeches בַד֮ <WH906> and his linen יִלְבַּ֣שׁ <WH3847> shall he put עַל־ <WH5921> next בְּשָׂרוֹ֒ <WH1320> upon his flesh וְהֵרִ֣ים <WH7311> and take up אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֗שֶׁן <WH1880> the ashes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תֹּאכַ֥ל <WH398> hath consumed הָאֵ֛שׁ <WH784> which the fire אֶת־ <WH854> for הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> with the burnt offering עַל־ <WH5921> next הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> on the altar וְשָׂמ֕וֹ <WH7760> and he shall put אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> them beside הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> the altar

וּפָשַׁט֙ <WH6584> And he shall put off אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֔יו <WH899> his garments וְלָבַ֖שׁ <WH3847> and put on בְּגָדִ֣ים <WH899> garments אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other וְהוֹצִ֤יא <WH3318> and carry forth אֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֙שֶׁן֙ <WH1880> the ashes אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> the camp אֶל־ <WH413> about מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> place טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> unto a clean

וְהָאֵ֨שׁ <WH784> And the fire עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <WH4196> upon the altar תּֽוּקַד־ <WH3344> shall be burning בּוֹ֙ לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִכְבֶּ֔ה <WH3518> in it it shall not be put out וּבִעֵ֨ר <WH1197> shall burn עָלֶ֧יהָ <WH5921> out הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> and the priest עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> wood בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> on it every morning בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> morning וְעָרַ֤ךְ <WH6186> in order עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> out הָֽעֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> and lay the burnt offering וְהִקְטִ֥יר <WH6999> upon it and he shall burn עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and חֶלְבֵ֥י <WH2459> thereon the fat הַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> of the peace offerings
אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> The fire תָּמִ֛יד <WH8548> shall ever תּוּקַ֥ד <WH3344> be burning עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not תִכְבֶֽה׃ <WH3518> it shall never go out ס

וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> And this [is] the law הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> of the meat offering הַקְרֵ֨ב <WH7126> shall offer אֹתָ֤הּ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> of Aaron לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> it before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> in פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> the altar

וְהֵרִ֨ים <WH7311> And he shall take מִמֶּ֜נּוּ <WH4480> at בְּקֻמְצ֗וֹ <WH7062> of it his handful מִסֹּ֤לֶת <WH5560> of the flour הַמִּנְחָה֙ <WH4503> of the meat offering וּמִשַּׁמְנָ֔הּ <WH8081> and of the oil וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַלְּבֹנָ֔ה <WH3828> thereof and all the frankincense אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> which [is] upon the meat offering וְהִקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> and shall burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> [it] upon the altar רֵ֧יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֛חַ <WH5207> [for] a sweet אַזְכָּרָתָ֖הּ <WH234> [even] the memorial לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of it unto the LORD

וְהַנּוֹתֶ֣רֶת <WH3498> And the remainder מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> are to יֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> eat אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> thereof shall Aaron וּבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons מַצּ֤וֹת <WH4682> with unleavened bread תֵּֽאָכֵל֙ <WH398> shall it be eaten בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place קָדֹ֔שׁ <WH6918> in the holy בַּחֲצַ֥ר <WH2691> in the court אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation יֹאכְלֽוּהָ׃ <WH398> they shall eat

לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תֵאָפֶה֙ <WH644> It shall not be baken חָמֵ֔ץ <WH2557> with leaven חֶלְקָ֛ם <WH2506> it [unto them for] their portion נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> I have given אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> מֵאִשָּׁ֑י <WH801> of my offerings made by fire קֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> holy הִ֔וא <WH1931> he כַּחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> as [is] the sin offering וְכָאָשָֽׁם׃ <WH817> and as the trespass offering

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every זָכָ֞ר <WH2145> All the males בִּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> among the children אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> of Aaron יֹֽאכֲלֶ֔נָּה <WH398> shall eat חָק־ <WH2706> of it [It shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> in your generations מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> Every אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִגַּ֥ע <WH5060> every one that toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם יִקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <WH6942> them shall be holy פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

זֶ֡ה <WH2088> This קָרְבַּן֩ <WH7133> This [is] the offering אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> of Aaron וּבָנָ֜יו <WH1121> and of his sons אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַקְרִ֣יבוּ <WH7126> which they shall offer לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day הִמָּשַׁ֣ח <WH4886> when he is anointed אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> עֲשִׂירִ֨ת <WH6224> the tenth part הָאֵפָ֥ה <WH374> of an ephah סֹ֛לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour מִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> for a meat offering תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> perpetual מַחֲצִיתָ֣הּ <WH4276> half בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> of it in the morning וּמַחֲצִיתָ֖הּ <WH4276> and half בָּעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> thereof at night

עַֽל־ <WH5921> on מַחֲבַ֗ת <WH4227> In a pan בַּשֶּׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> with oil תֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> it shall be made מֻרְבֶּ֣כֶת <WH7246> [and when it is] baken תְּבִיאֶ֑נָּה <WH935> thou shalt bring תֻּפִינֵי֙ <WH8601> it in [and] the baken מִנְחַ֣ת <WH4503> of the meat offering פִּתִּ֔ים <WH6595> pieces תַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> shalt thou offer רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> [for] a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֧יחַ <WH4899> that is anointed תַּחְתָּ֛יו <WH8478> his place מִבָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> in his stead shall offer אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> חָק־ <WH2706> it [it is] a statute עוֹלָ֕ם <WH5769> for ever לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּלִ֥יל <WH3632> it shall be wholly תָּקְטָֽר׃ <WH6999> burnt

וְכָל־ <WH3605> every מִנְחַ֥ת <WH4503> For every meat offering כֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> for the priest כָּלִ֥יל <WH3632> shall be wholly burnt תִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> it shall not be eaten פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> Speak אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> and to his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying זֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> This [is] the law הַֽחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> of the sin offering בִּמְק֡וֹם <WH4725> In the place אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> where תִּשָּׁחֵ֨ט <WH7819> is killed הָעֹלָ֜ה <WH5930> where the burnt offering תִּשָּׁחֵ֤ט <WH7819> be killed הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> shall the sin offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> The priest הַֽמְחַטֵּ֥א <WH2398> that offereth it for sin אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> יֹאכֲלֶ֑נָּה <WH398> shall eat בְּמָק֤וֹם <WH4725> place קָדֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> it in the holy תֵּֽאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> shall it be eaten בַּחֲצַ֖ר <WH2691> in the court אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> Anyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִגַּ֥ע <WH5060> Whatsoever shall touch בִּבְשָׂרָ֖הּ <WH1320> the flesh יִקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH6942> thereof shall be holy וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> and when יִזֶּ֤ה <WH5137> and when there is sprinkled מִדָּמָהּ֙ <WH1818> of the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַבֶּ֔גֶד <WH899> thereof upon any garment אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> what יִזֶּ֣ה <WH5137> that whereon it was sprinkled עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and תְּכַבֵּ֖ס <WH3526> thou shalt wash בְּמָק֥וֹם <WH4725> place קָדֹֽשׁ׃ <WH6918> in the holy
